#furry #wtdraw

"slightly" suggestive sight I made, M3 Bradley and Leopard 2A6 that must really like whoever is using the sight.

this thing took FOREVER for me to figure out how to get working, and it's not exactly too complicated to fix if it doesn't work for you

if it doesn't work, then:

1: find war thunder in your steam library
2: right-click the war thunder game tab and go to "manage --> browse local files"
3: navigate to your "UserSights" folder
4: create a new folder (unless you already have one) and rename it to include the country of origin and the name of the tank (ex. ussr_t_72m2_moderna...
